events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return it and get a refund because the product wasn't as described.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for a return and money back.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to assist with the refund request and return process.
Hello! This is Jessica from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the product is unopened or unused for the return process?
My order number is 982347. The product is unopened; I decided I don't need it anymore and would like to return it.
Thank you for the info. You can return the unopened product within 14 days via our prepaid shipping label, and we will issue a full refund upon receipt.
That sounds great, thank you! Please send me the shipping label as soon as possible so I can return the item.
I have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email address. Once we receive the returned item, the refund will be processed immediately.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent back the return package and see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I dropped the package off yesterday at the post office, thank you for your help throughout the process.
We have received your returned package and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your refund experience.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey and indicated they were very happy with the support received during the refund process.
Based on the successful refund and positive feedback, the support case has been closed. Thank you for contacting us.
